name: Walking Hell
description: At the end of the road there is only one way, death, but what lies after is different for every individual. Walking hell; a short experience not really a full game so to say just something I made to tell a story. But I hope you enjoy it, if there is enough positive feed back I'll probably tell the story leading up to this in a future game, so stay tuned! Please leave any feedback you have about it, the story, the music, anything so that I can make future projects better. I did try to make it so that you can play in browser however, there were some issues with it so it will be download only until I can fix those issues. The fire sound effect is from zapsplat.com
